title: ArtiAA Token File Format
description: This is the format of the ArtiAA Token File, a standard output that contains the Artifactory tokens for the user.

tokens.title: Tokens URL Map
tokens.description:
Map of URLs and the credentials that apply to them.
The key of each value is the base domain URL the credential applies to, such as 'artifactory.rbx.com'.
ArtiAA will add an entry for each URL it has been logged into.

username.title: Username
username.description:
The username to use for accessing the server, if a username is necessary.
May be an empty string.

token.title: Token
token.description: The token to use for accessing the server.
